fa-avatar/icon.description: the Icon type for an icon avatar, see Icon Component

fa-avatar/src.description: the address of the image for an image avatar

fa-avatar/srcSet.description: a list of sources to use for different screen resolutions

fa-avatar/alt.description: This attribute defines the alternative text describing the image
